text: Mayaguana is the most easterly island and district of the Bahamas. It is one of only two Bahamian islands which retain their Arawak names, the other being Inagua. The population of Mayaguana in the 2000 census was 259 and is currently about 312. It has an area of about 110 square miles. ==Other websites== * Islands of the Bahamas: Mayaguana * Bahamas Getaway: Mayaguana * Images of Mayaguana Category:Districts of the Bahamas Category:Islands of the Bahamas
title: Mayaguana
